Des_Plaines.Schiller Park, Illinois:
Schiller Park is a village in Cook County, Illinois, United States. The population was 11,793 at the 2010 census.


== Geography ==
Schiller Park is located at 41°57′22″N 87°52′14″W.
According to the 2010 census, Schiller Park has a total area of 2.77 square miles (7.17 km2), all land.
